about_the_game: Raconteur is a first-person exploration game. Alfred Poe is a imaginative writer that he uses his imagination as a powerful tool to create virtual worlds and making his own stories in his inner world. But he is not alone in this world, his companion is Daimon who is significantly helpful to help him at creating great stories for his scripts. It took too long for Alfred to going back to the virtual space, for one last script. But his faithful friend is so angry at him, and he was changing the world when Mr. Poe was enjoying outside. So, Alfred Poe is not in a peaceful place to inspire him anymore, to escape is all there is ... but he's here to survive.
